CvSU - Tanza Campus conducted a Fire Safety Protection and Awareness Webinar for our students, Faculty and Staff during the pandemic.
CvSU- Tanza Campus Faculty, Students, and Staff attended a Fire Safety Seminar and Training headed by BFP Tanza Cavite.
